review: Purchased this Apple TV for my parents to hook to there Sony Bravia tv via hdmi cable but connection goes in and out. Have updated the tv, updated the Apple TV, tried numerous different hdmi cables and no luck getting it to stay connected picture goes in and out. The voice talking on the Apple TV is by far one of the most annoying I have heard and at first even after I turned it off still kept going. After trying 6 different hdmi cables finally got one that for now seems to work with it. Will see how it goes and hope the issue I had initially is no more. Both junk hdmi cable and funky glitches in Apple TV.
author: A. Mancheski "A Yooper"

review: I have a love/hate relationship with Apple, but I just hate this thing. My feelings would be different if there was a Jailbreak for it (coming soon) and if in that Jailbreak I could access more things. What's the problem? NO APPS! Do you use Amazon to watch movies? Well, you can't on Apple TV. Do you watch cable shows on Xfinity? Can't do that on Apple TV. What about HBO GO? Nope! All you get for streaming is Netflix, other then Hulu which is crap. I am not even able to use Air Play and watch these apps on my iPad through Apple TV. What's the point of a set top box without useable apps? What's the point of Air Play if I cannot watch these apps that are on my Ipad? I have the first generation Roku and it is far more capable then this thing. If you own or have ever used a Roku then don't even think about this device. Apple needs to open up the source code on this and let people create apps for it. Some of the previous mentioned apps are an issue with them and Apple not seeing eye to eye, but as the customer that is not my problem.
